title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2074/85 of 25 July 1985 amending Regulation (EEC) No 496/70 laying down initial provisions on quality control of fruit and vegetables exported to third countries
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2074/85
of 25 July 1985
amending Regulation (EEC) No 496/70 laying down initial provisions on quality control of fruit and vegetables exported to third countries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following is hereby added to Article 4 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 496/70:
'A certificate shall not however be required for supplies of fruit and vegetables covered by Article 5 (1) (a) of Regulation (EEC) No 2730/79 in respect of which the procedure specified in Article 26 of that Regulation or in Regulation (EEC) No 565/80 is not used.'

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 October 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
